actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain married individuals who file separate returns to be taxed as unmarried individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow married individuals filing separate income tax returns to elect to be taxed at rates applicable to unmarried individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain married individuals who file separate returns to be taxed as unmarried individuals.
